thread.title: Honeymoons and Get-A-Ways is proud to announce its 10th anniversary of being the premier, luxury destination wedding & honeymoon provider worldwide
thread.title_full: Honeymoons and Get-A-Ways is proud to announce its 10th anniversary of being the premier, luxury destination wedding & honeymoon provider worldwide

author: prbuzz.com
title: Honeymoons and Get-A-Ways is proud to announce its 10th anniversary of being the premier, luxury destination wedding & honeymoon provider worldwide
text:
North Wales, PA / Honeymoons and Get-A-Ways is proud to announce its 10th anniversary of being the premier, luxury destination wedding and honeymoon provider worldwide. The company was founded by Nancy Barkley on the premise of “Quality over Quantity”, a concept that sets Honeymoons and Get-A-Ways aside from its competitors. The personal and superior customer service that is assured to all clients, keeps them coming, as Honeymoons and Get-A-Ways procures considerable referral business from past, satisfied clients.
“I love to answer a phone call with a bride-to-be stating that she was told to call Honeymoons and Get-A-Ways because her friend had a flawless destination wedding.” says Barkley. “That tells me that we are doing things right here at Honeymoons and Get-A-Ways!” she added.
Nancy Barkley is a certified, Life Style Specialist for Honeymoons and Destinations Weddings. Nancy contributed her destination wedding expertise to various media outlets, including CNN, Fox News, magazines and other publications. She is a much sought after feature speaker at Destination Wedding events worldwide, and was selected as one of the 3 US representatives to attend the first ever International Destination Wedding Congress held in Athens, Greece.
Barkley planned her own destination wedding 23 years ago. She recognized the need for a service-oriented destination wedding company. This idea combined with her travel industry experience, laid the foundation to Honeymoons and Get-A-Ways.
Clients of Honeymoons and Get-A-Ways truly “come in as clients and leave as friends”.

Nancy Barkley
